venue.phone: Please Send Me A Message on Meet
venue.name: Davis Square

item.description:
Honk! Fest Returns from Thursday October 4 thru Monday October 8. 

Complete information and updates at http://honkfest.org 

The best way to play Honk! Fest on this day is to check out the Band Schedule on line and proceed to your favorite bands hourly.

It is a special treat at 12:30 pm to be in Davis Square and watch all of the bands converge on 7 Hills Park for the opening ceremonies. Or just show up later as there is no way to keep a group together with so much talent to catch. On Saturday, October 6 from 12:30pm to 9:00pm over 30 activist street bands from around the country and beyond, perform outdoors in multiple locations in Davis Square for free. More information, schedules and updates will be available at www.honkfest.org [url=www.honkfest.org][/url] or 617-383-4665.

I can not properly describe the Honk! Fest. You must go to their web site for more information. It's a long day. Arrive early, later or in the middle of the mayhem. I will be attending Honk Fest with some friends as I have since its birth. We will be taking a break for dinner at Mike's Restaurant in the heart of Davis Square. Maybe we will catch part of one of the American or National League Playoff Games too. Those who want to meetup e mail other attending Natives to meet. 

Additional Honk! Fest events to take place from Thursday October 4 thru Monday October 8.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there around 1pm. I know everyone except Juan.
item.name: Honk! Fest in Davis Square
